Karabo Poppy Moletsane (amụrụ n'afọ 1992) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe osise na South Africa, ónyé na-emepụta ihe osise, na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri n'okporo ámá.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nà Open Window Institute nà Pretoria mà nwee nzèrè na Visual Communication

Poppy arụwo ọrụ màkà Wall Street Journal, Google, Coca-Cola, na Nike, gụnyere imepụta akpụkpọ ụkwụ LeBron James na-eyi. O mepụtara ihe osise màkà usoro Afrịka mbụ na Netflix, Queen Sono, na When They See Us
Ya na RICH MNISI rụkọtara ọrụ na nchịkọta uwe unisex, nke a na-akpọ Running Errands, na 2020. A na-etinye mural Utah Jazz ya na Salt Lake City, Utah.
N'afọ 2021, Wikipedia nyèrè ya ọrụ, ya na Jasmina El Bouamraoui, ịmepụta akara otu narị na otu màkà ncheta afọ irí abụọ nké Wikipedia.
A na-egosipụta ihe osise ya dị ka ihe owuwu ọbọdọ gafee Johannesburg, ma gosipụta na Times Square, na vidiyo egwu, na Soweto Towers.
E depụtara ya na ndepụta Forbes n'okpuru irí àtó n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe na 2019.  Ihe osise ya nkè 2019 màkà Nike meriri BASA Beyond Border Partnership Award
N'afọ 2020, a kpọrọ ya Ónyé Okike nke Afọ site n'etiti 10 na 5.
